title: Picture upload works great.
message:
Picture upload works great.
Tried Retrofit, which is great. We're not using it, though, because it's SLOW. SOOO SLOW.
Besides, this is a learner's project, so doing things the hard way is the way to go. And it's fast. Damn fast.
